public class editUserActivity extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
Activity to edit the user's profile information. Allows users to set their profile picture, name, phone number, email, and notification preferences.

      private void sendEntrantData(String id, String name, String phone, String email, double latitude, double longitude)
      Saves the user's data and profile picture to Firestore and Firebase Storage.
      Parameters:
      id - The user's unique device ID.
      name - The user's name.
      phone - The user's phone number.
      email - The user's email address.
      latitude - The latitude of the user's location.
      longitude - The longitude of the user's location.
